# init(coder:)

**Initializer**

Creates a command alternative from data in an unarchiver.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor init?(coder: NSCoder)
```

## Creating a command alternative

- **init(title:action:modifierFlags:)**: Creates a command alternative with the specified title, action, and modifier flags.

items.description: Creates a command alternative with the specified title, action, and modifier flags.
items.name: init(title:action:modifierFlags:)
